content.question: Which of the following numerical expressions gives the number of moles in <math alttext="5.0 grams" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></math> of <math alttext="C a O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>CaO</mtext></mrow></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="5.0 grams times 56 grams per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>56</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5.0 grams over 56 grams per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>56</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="56 grams per mole over 5.0 grams" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>56</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 1 over 5.0 grams, end fraction, times the fraction 1 over 56 grams per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>56</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="5.0 grams over 56 grams per mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>56</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
